JOB POSTING
 
  JOB TITLE: Clinical Aide 
  CLASSIFICATION: Registered Practical Nurse 
 JOB TYPE: Permanent part-time 0.6 FTE  
 (21 hours/week) with HOOPP pension & 
  Entitlements 
  DEPARTMENT: Primary Health Care 
  REPORTS TO: Manager, Primary Health Care 
  START DATE: As soon as possible 
  PAY RANGE: $26.19 to $30.81 per hour 
  DEADLINE TO APPLY: Friday, October 20th, 2023 at 5 pm EST 
  SUBMIT: https://swchc.bamboohr.com/careers/580 
  ________________________________________________________________________________
 
  ABOUT US 
  We are Somerset West Community Health Centre (SWCHC), a non-profit, community-governed organization that serves over 18,000 clients annually. Established in 1978, SWCHC provides a wide range of health care services such as primary health care, health promotion, community development, mental health and harm reduction. We are deeply connected to the communities we serve and committed to removing barriers to accessing services for people who are vulnerable because of their age, income, ability, sexual orientation or gender identity, and language or culture. 
  SWCHC strives to ensure that our team reflects the communities we serve. We work within an anti-racist, anti-oppressive framework that acknowledges the existence and impacts of systemic racism, and seeks to ensure that systems are fair and equitable for everyone.
 
  JOB SUMMARY 
  Reporting to the Manager, the Clinical Aide is responsible for assisting Primary Health Care staff with duties that include ordering and maintaining medical and laboratory supplies, medication samples, medical equipment; and stocking all exam and procedure rooms. The Clinical Aide checks all sources for medical supplies, ensuring cost-effective purchasing and establishes working relationships with local representatives. With knowledge of infection prevention and control, the Clinical Aide conducts reprocessing of medical instruments, leads mask fit testing and assists the Manager of Primary Health Care with monitoring of infection prevention and control best practice guidelines.
 
  POSITION REQUIREMENTS 
  
  Registered Practical Nurse, current CNO license 
  Added skill diploma from a recognized program i.e. Algonquin College Level I and II 
  Valid driver’s license and use of own vehicle
 
  
  
  Key Competencies 
  
  Two - three years of nursing experience 
  Knowledge of infection prevention & control (IPAC) practices, certification(s) in reprocessing or IPAC an asset 
  Excellent communication skills 
  Able to work effectively in an inter-professional environment 
  Organized and detail-orientated 
  Ability to work independently with minimal supervision 
  Proficient use of computers and various software applications 
  Comfortable working in a busy environment with multiple demands
 
  
  
  Linguistic profile 
  
  English required 
  French or other languages an asset
 
  
  
  If interested, please submit a cover letter and resume by Friday, October 20th, 2023 at 5 pm EST to: https://swchc.bamboohr.com/careers/580
  
  
  **It is the policy of SWCHC to require COVID-19 immunization for all employees, volunteers, students, and contractors, including those who work off-site with the following exceptions: Persons with a medical reason that prevents them from being vaccinated against COVID-19; Persons with other reasonable considerations pursuant to the Ontario Human Rights Code that restrict them from being vaccinated against Covid 19 vaccination.**
 
  Somerset West Community Health Centre is an equal opportunity employer who values the diversity of individuals in our programs and services.
  
  
  We welcome and encourage applications from members of Indigenous, Black and racialized communities, Two-Spirit, nonbinary, LGBTQ+ people; people with disabilities; and members of other equity deserving communities. Applicants are encouraged to share accessibility needs in the application process, and every attempt will be made to accommodate them.
  
  
  Due to the high volume of applicants, we can neither confirm receipt of nor respond to inquiries regarding your application. Only candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.
